name: Krag the Tentacled
description: A hulking figure draped in patchwork cybernetics and stained silks, Krag moves with unsettling grace despite his bulk. A mass of pulsating tentacles sprout from his back, twitching erratically as if they have a mind of their own – or perhaps he does.

personality.voice: Deep and guttural with a hint of static.
personality.agenda: Survive long enough to find a permanent cure for his volatile mutation.
personality.background: Krag was once an enforcer in the corporate sector, until a botched augmentation caused him to become Volatile. He escaped Zenith-9, but returned after years scavenging the Undercity, seeking advanced tech and hoping to find a solution.

flavor.rationale: Krag is an anomaly among the vendors in Zenith-9. Driven by volatile surges and needing constant doses of suppressants, he's tolerated due to his unique offerings – rare cybernetics scavenged from the Undercity.
